meanings.sent1: The regainers of the lost treasure were overjoyed.
meanings.sent2: The regainers of their lost memories felt a sense of relief.
meanings.sent3: The regainers of the missing cat celebrated with a party.
meanings.sent4: The regainers of hope found a new sense of purpose.
meanings.sent5: The regainers of the stolen bike were proud of their detective work.

meanings.sent1: The regainers of strength after illness felt grateful.
meanings.sent2: The regainers of balance after a stumble regained their composure.
meanings.sent3: The regainers of lost time tried to catch up with a time machine.
meanings.sent4: The regainers of lost love found solace in new friendships.
meanings.sent5: The regainers of lost items searched high and low to find them.
